import React, { useState } from 'react'; // import './EntertainmentSection.css'; const images1 = [ `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/billy2.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/billy1.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/billy3.jpg` ]; const images2 = [ `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/pool2.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/pool1.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/pool3.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/pool4.jpg` ]; const images3 = [ `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/sauna1.jpeg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/sauna2.jpeg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/sauna3.jpg`, `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/vivian-source/sauna4.jpg` ]; const ImageSlider = ({ images }) => { const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); const handlePrevious = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex === 0 ? images.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1)); }; const handleNext = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex === images.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1)); }; return (
); }; const EntertainmentSection = () => { return (
{/*

Phòng giải trí

Bao gồm Bi-a, Bi lắc, Karaoke

Bể bơi vô cực

Bể bơi với chiều dài 30m, view vườn hoa rực rỡ

Xông Hơi

Chạy 24/7 với 2 loại sông khác nhau

*/}
); }; export default EntertainmentSection;
